Name: osteomyelitis
Definition: A bone inflammation disease that has_material_basis_in infection located_in bone or located_in bone marrow.

Name: epicondylitis
Definition: A bone inflammation disease that results_in inflammation located_in epicondyle.

Name: Caffey disease
Definition: A bone inflammation disease that causes bone changes

Name: ankylosing spondylitis
Definition: A bone inflammation disease that results_in inflammation in the joints of the spine and pelvis. The disease has_symptom pain

Name: Osgood-Schlatter's disease
Definition: A bone inflammation disease that involves rupture of the growth plate in children located_in tibia.

Name: arthritis
Definition: A bone inflammation disease that involves a response to irritation or injury
